title: The Savvy Woman's Secrets to Outwit a Cheating Man
description: This inspirational book is your personal coach, best friend, and kick-in-the-butt you need to create a happy, cheat-free life ... with or without him! Tap into savvy psychological tips and surveillance techniques that will reveal the truth about what (or who) he's doing behind your back. Get smart, get strong, and get on with your happy life ... FAST!
author: Ellen Ames
